Title: Gear Enchanting
Description:
Hello, outlander!

I've heard of your exploits since your dramatic arrival on our shores. We earthen welcome your aid.

I can teach you how to enchant your gear with resources from my land. To defeat our enemies, every bit of power helps.
ObjectivesText: Complete the item enchantment tutorial by enchanting any ring using the enchantment given from Ellerdin, Enchant Ring - Glimmering Haste.
CompletionText: The enchantment and ring I gave you are fitting for each other. You may also use your own.
RewardText: May you be undefeatable as the earth itself. On your way now, outlander!

Objectives.Text: Any eligible ring enchanted with Enchant Ring - Glimmering Haste
